headline: Tracking David Tepper's Appaloosa Management Portfolio - Q2 2025 Update
summary: David Tepper's Q2'25 portfolio changes reveal bold bets on Whirlpool and healthcare, trimmed big tech gains, and a bullish stance on tech and healthcare trends. See more.

headline: IQVIA and Flagship Pioneering Announce Strategic Collaboration to Accelerate the Development of Breakthrough Life Sciences Companies
summary: IQVIA (NYSE: IQV), a leading global provider of clinical research services, commercial insights and healthcare intelligence, and Flagship Pioneering, the bioplatform innovation company, today announced a strategic collaboration to accelerate the development of breakthrough life sciences companies.
